messages.title: COALITION OF CHAOS
messages.content: DON'T LET YOUR VOTE PUT ED MILIBAND INTO NO. 10 PROPPED UP BY OTHER PARTIES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting our NHS and delivering for patients.
Creating jobs by supporting local businesses. Securing Liverpool's position at the heart of the Northern Powerhouse vision.
Crime is too high in Liverpool West Derby. We need more police on the streets to protect the local community.

issues.health: Supporting our NHS and delivering for patients. Continuing to invest in our local hospitals.
